mapper.select: SELECT id,admin_code,password,name,telephone,email,enrolldate,role_name FROM admin_info JOIN (SELECT admin_id,GROUP_CONCAT(name) As role_name FROM role JOIN admin_role ON id=role_id GROUP BY admin_id) AS role_temp ON admin_info.id=role_temp.admin_id WHERE admin_code=#{adminCode}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(role_privilege.privilege_id)) privilege FROM role_privilege JOIN admin_role ON admin_role.role_id=role_privilege.role_id WHERE admin_id=#{admin_id} GROUP BY admin_id
